item.title: 记录在数据平面选择流的过程
item.description: 选择的流经过所有的交换机 控制器实时构造rule graph 获取所有的ingress rule（入度为0的规则），并依长度降序排序 对每一个ingress rule

item.title: Solving Minimum Path Cover on a DAG
item.description: 文章目的 介绍一个用于在有向无环图（DAG）中进行最小路径覆盖（Minimum Path Cover, MPC）的算法。文中给定了一个场景（交通网络中的运输问题），

item.title: A Deep Learning Approach to Network Intrusion Detection
item.description: Shone N , Ngoc T N , Phai V D , et al. A Deep Learning Approach to Network Intrusion Detection[J]. IEEE Transactions on Emerging Topics in Computational Intelligence, 2018, 2(1):41-50. 本文提出用stacked Non-Symmetric deep Auto-encoders 方法进行特征抽取，并将提取的特征传给随机森林进行

item.title: Hybrid Deep-Learning-Based Anomaly Detection Scheme for Suspicious Flow Detection in SDN: A Social Multimedia Perspective
item.description: Garg S , Kaur K , Kumar N , et al. Hybrid Deep-Learning-Based Anomaly Detection Scheme for Suspicious Flow Detection in SDN: A Social Multimedia Perspective[J]. IEEE Transactions on Multimedia, 2019, 21(3):566-578. 本文利用受限波尔兹曼机进行异常检测。 异常检测模型 controller请求流统

item.title: Automatic test packet generation
item.description: Zeng H , Kazemian P , Varghese G , et al. Automatic test packet generation[C]// International Conference on Emerging Networking Experiments & Technologies. IEEE, 2012. 背景分析 当前特别需要自动化的网络测试工具 概念 packets Switch Rules：defines how header space at ingress is transformed into

item.title: FOCES: Detecting Forwarding Anomalies in Software Defined Networks
item.description: Peng Z, Xu S, Yang Z, et al. FOCES: Detecting Forwarding Anomalies in Software Defined Networks[C]// IEEE International Conference on Distributed Computing Systems. 2018. B类。本文提供一种在SDN中进行forwarding anomaly 检测方法，（只提供检测，并未提供定位与

item.title: A Novel Anomaly Detection System to Asist Network Management in SDN Enviroment
item.description: Carvalho L F , Fernandes G , Rodrigues J J P C , et al. A novel anomaly detection system to assist network management in SDN environment[C]// IEEE International Conference on Communications. IEEE, 2017. C类。本文提出一种辅助网络管理的异常检测系统，算法运行在controll

item.title: A detection method for anomaly flow in software defined network
item.description: Huijun P , Zhe S , Xuejian Z , et al. [J]. IEEE Access, 2018:1-1. 本文件基于knn的一个改进算法提出了一个异常检测算法。 一些概念： 欧几里德距离：$D_{ij}^y = \sqrt{\sum_{a=1}^{t}({X_{ia} - X_{ja}})^2}$ str

item.title: An Analysis of Using Reflectors for Distributed Denial-of-Service Attacks
item.description: Paxson, Vern. An analysis of using reflectors for distributed denial-of-service attacks[J]. ACM SIGCOMM Computer Communication Review, 2001, 31(3):38. 本文先讲解了DDoS攻击，再讲解基于reflector的DDoS攻击，最后基于各种网络协议的字段进行挨个

item.title: JESS: Joint Entropy-Based DDoS Defense Scheme in SDN
item.description: Kalkan K , Altay L , Gur G , et al. JESS: Joint Entropy Based DDoS Defense Scheme in SDN[J]. IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications, 2018:1-1. 该文提出了一种基于熵的DDoS攻击的检测与缓解办法。 introduction SDN存在安全问题，如DDoS
